name: Remove these Restraints
instruction: May I venture an opinion? I think you ought to change the code to try something new. But what do I know?

suggestions.title: Make the Stormtrooper refuse to remove the restraints.
suggestions.content: Pick 'I will tighten these restraints, scavenger scum!' from the dropdown list.

suggestions.title: Stop Rey from being released from the restraints.
suggestions.content: Change 'unfreeze' to 'freeze', or remove this block to keep Rey in place.

suggestions.title: Move the Stormtrooper towards Rey.
suggestions.content: Change the x position of the Stormtrooper to a higher number.
